mapper.select: select uid,upw, uname from tbl_user where uid = #{uid} and upw = #{upw}
select count(*) from tbl_user where uname=#{uname}
select count(*) from tbl_user where uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set sessionkey = #{sessionId} ,sessionlimit = #{next} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where sessionkey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()
select uid,uname,umail,gender from tbl_user where uname = #{uname};
select uf.follow,(select uname from tbl_user where uid = uf.follow) as uname from tbl_user u left join user_follow uf on(u.uid=uf.id) where u.uid=#{uid};
select id as follower from user_follow where follow=#{uid}

select * from (select *,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum from tbl_user as tu join (select @rownum:=0) as rn order by regdate desc) as T
where rownum >(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rownum<= #{amount} * #{pageNum}
